name: EnigMatrix Puzzles
description:
EnigMatrix:
Word Games & Conceptual Puzzles

Place the pieces (words, numbers or symbols) in the correct order to solve the enigmas. Dozens of puzzles available for your leisure. If you get stuck, you can always get by with a hint. Earn some hints as a reward for solving the difficult puzzles. Game progress will be devices via iCloud. Relax, think and have fun!

Puzzle Themes:
1 - WORDS & SAYINGS
2 - ARTS, PEOPLE & PLACES
3 - NUMERIC ENIGMAS
